Package platform

package contains classes to build a model from the hardware platform.

See: Description

Package platform Description

package contains classes to build a model from the hardware platform. A platform model consists of components such as clusters, processors, network links etc. We don't use this model very extensively, but use only some parameters of it. We had a vision to perform communication scheduling and network route selection. However, the work remains incomplete. If required, these classes can be discarded easily.
Author:
Pranav Tendulkar
